summary.Title: RECEPTIONIST
summary.Presentation: D'ANGLETERRE IS LOOKING FOR A RECEPTIONISTDo you have experience in hotels & luxury service and wish to join our dedicated and talented Front Office team in a privileged

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
D'ANGLETERRE IS LOOKING FOR A RECEPTIONIST

Do you have experience in hotels & luxury service and wish to join our dedicated and talented Front Office team in a privileged environment? If so, we would like to receive your application.
Hotel d'Angleterre seeks not only a high level of experience and education, but also dynamic, pragmatic and flexible people with a highly developed sense of guest service and luxury.

WE OFFER
A professional work environment where we always strive to provide our guests with personalized, stylish and elegant experience of international standard. We are a young dynamic team with high ambitions and room for development. We are dedicated to our guests, our colleagues and our workplace. We offer a healthy work environment & a culture where you will work with colleagues from all over the world. Through our internal d’Anglecademy you will be trained in various programs to give you best possible circumstances for growth and success. 

ABOUT THE JOB
As a Receptionist, you will ensure that our guests feels elevated with each interaction. You will be responsible for the daily operation at the reception. Besides checking hotel guests in and out, according to the Leading Hotels of the World standards, you will assist our guests with different requests, monitors safety and handle other administrative tasks. You will represent the heart of the hotel and will work close together with all the other departments. This role offers great opportunity to develop both professional and personal in an environment where no days are alike.

WE EXPECT
You are outgoing, service-minded and you enjoy the role as host. We also expect that you have experience from other hotels, preferably international and from the luxury segment. You thrive in an energetic and hectic environment with many tasks at the same time, and you manage to still maintain full overview. You understand the importance of always being ‘on stage’ and always being fresh, rested and "perfectly groomed". We expect that you speak and understand English fluently, Danish is a plus as well as perhaps a third language.
